query:
SELECT 
                u.id,
                u.username,
                u.email,
                r.role_name,
                COUNT(*) OVER () as total_items
            FROM
                users u
            JOIN 
                roles r ON u.role_id = r.id
            WHERE
                ($3::TEXT IS NULL OR u.username ILIKE $3 OR u.email ILIKE $3)
            ORDER BY
                u.id
            LIMIT $1
            OFFSET $2
